title: Ice Cream Club - Watch Face
summary: Stay cool with this custom-made Ice Cream watch face!
developerAddress: Ukraine, 02081, Kiev, Darnitskij area, Anna Akhmatova street, 22, office 4009

descriptionHTML:
🔴The best time for ice cream is… always!😻🔵

Fun watch face with a hand-drawn chalk design and a blackboard background.
Perfect fit for a nice summer mood.

🌟Main features:
- Nice sketchy design;
- Animated;
- Optional time formats;
- Displays current day and date;
- Battery life indicator;
- Smart ambient mode.

⌚Is it for me?
Ice Cream Club is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both on round and square models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 3;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG Watch Style;
✔ LG Watch Sport;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ Huawei Watch 2;
✔ Polar M600;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, S2 and S3 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

🚀How to install?
This watch face will be installed automatically from your paired phone.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Once installed, you can select the Ice Cream Club Watch Face from the Android Wear App or directly on your watch. Few taps and you are ready to go!

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions

Not sure if ready to buy? Try out this watch face in our Collection app for free! - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.boost.watchcore 🙊
comments: My favorite watch face. I'd love to see more from this developer. The only thing I wish it had is a (weather) temperature.
